Posts.Content: hi again dawn here , I wish to thankyou for the advice it is appreciated as I really do not understand much of this at all , so a big thankyou to all xx I will keep you updated as david goes in tomorrow for the biopsy then have to wait 2wks for the redults !! thanx to all bless you xx
Posts.Title: so worried for my partner :(

Posts.Content: hi there, I am so sorry to burden you all with my worries as I have no where else to turn,, my david is 53yrs he recently had a ct scan of his abdomen which showed a enlarged prostate, there fore a consultant done a dre and stated the prostate was indeed enlarged but smooth , he then sent david for psa bloods to be taken , we received a letter to see a urologist he done another dre and stated his prostate was enlarged and one side rigid he then went on t say you do know what I am talking about here I am going to send you for a biopsy of the prostate which is to be done this Monday,but he kept stressing after the biopsy we look at which avenues to take ect we came out of that room so upset as we have now accepted that he must have a untoward diagnosis , we then went to see our gp he told david nothing other than a enlarged prostate showed up on the ct scan and his psa level was 5.3 or 5.7 im so confused , and soooo worried can anyone advise us here with anything . kindest regards d
Posts.Title: so worried for my partner :(

Posts.Content: hi there, dawn here I would like to say a big thankyou for answering me, I am so afraid for david and having you here to help means soooo much , david goes in tomorrow for the biopsy and then we have to wait 2 wks for the results! I will let you know what happens, bless you all xx
Posts.Title: so worried for my partner :(

Posts.Content: hi there , just to say a big thankyou fro the advice it means a lot xx
Posts.Title: so worried for my partner :(

Posts.Content: hi all, just thought to post to say david was told today he had had a cyst on his prostate , he has also been told that it was not anything untoward he was very ill as he went in for biopsy then consultant saw a cyst drained it and took a piece for biopsy 3 days later he was rushed in to hospital with sepsus he was in a bad way for 5 days , catheterised on all blood cleaning machinery, he is still not right and on the sick but hopes to have a healthy life xx thanx to all for the advice much appreciated from us both xx love to all xxx
Posts.Title: updated for david x

Posts.Content: just to keep you updated yesterday my partner david had his biopsy of prostate while this was done the consultant found a clot which he drained and removed a portion of for biopsy, he also told him it was infection? he is on antibiotics for 14 days, he also stated he is sending out papers for him to have a scan? of what I do not know as he just weeks ago had a abdominal scan ct, sooo worried xx dawn the consultant actuall read in full his medical report so he knew about the rta he was in a number of years ago which left him with crushed disks at the bottom of his spine, which he is on gabapentin for the pain x thanks again x
Posts.Title: me again
